Subject: Allowlisting a domain within a file?
Description:
Good day, 

  I've been attempting to make it so that an email domain is allowed to be within a file, like a text file and others. I've been unsuccessful with my current instructions.
What_We_Know__c:
3/10/2025
- Customer wanted to have a remote session with user to trouble shoot further the block issue he was experiencing
- Reached out to customer to schedule a remote session to look further into the issue
3/3/2025

- Joined remote session

- Customer is trying to upload a stack using a bat template on AWS : failed to fetch.

- Two active policies that could be blocking transparent.ly

- Instructed customer to go to Denylists and Allowlists > Allowlists > Deep Packet Inspection

- Add New Deep Packet Inspection Allow and add transpaent.ly under content and save

- From the policy, instructed customer to add newly created Allowlist to the Policy Allowlists > Deep Packet Inspection

- Customer is having his team test this out and will get back to us via email.
Solution_Comment__c: Customer will exclude developers from the policy in order to prevent API calls from being blocked
